definition[0]: existing or happening first, before other people or things
example[0]: The land was returned to its original owner.
example[1]: The kitchen still has many original features (=parts that were there when the house was first built).
example[2]: the original meaning of the word
example[3]: The original plan was to fly out to New York.
definition[1]: completely new and different from anything that anyone has thought of before
example[4]: I don’t think George is capable of having original ideas!
example[5]: That’s not a very original suggestion.
definition[2]: an original work of art is the one that was made by the artist and is not a copy
example[8]: The original painting is now in the National Gallery in London.
definition[3]: a work of art or a document that is not a copy, but is the one produced by the writer or artist
example[10]: The colours are much more striking in the original.
example[11]: I’ll keep a copy of the contract, and give you the original.
definition[4]: someone whose behaviour, clothing etc is unusual and amusing
example[12]: Which is the original document and which is the copy?
example[13]: The index-linked certificates were paying indexation plus 4% of theoriginal investment.
